headline: Contradicting Lives
description: An exploration of Siddhartha and Marcus Aurelius as expressions of humanity in contradiction—through two lives and the values they represent.
timeFelt: Quiet resonance between divergent lives—opposites in method, reflections in aim
resonantThread: The moral arc across culture—ascetic renunciation and engaged duty
whyItMatters: This piece sets the stage for Aleksandr's series on contradictory lives—posing the question: can opposite paths point toward a shared essence?
